prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body character design, a young man standing in the center, pure white background, traditional Chinese ink wash painting style, monochrome black, white, and gray tones, deep artistic conception, no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words.

He is an ordinary young man with a clean and mild appearance. His facial features are harmonious and unassuming: gentle eyebrows, calm and clear eyes with a hint of contemplation, a straight nose, and lips with a soft, natural curve. His expression is serene and focused, reflecting a pure and peaceful heart. His skin tone is a pale, natural shade rendered in ink wash gradients.

His dark hair is tied up in a simple, neat topknot, secured with a plain wooden hairpin, with a few loose strands falling gently by his temples. He wears a modest, traditional Chinese robe of a commoner, in shades of gray and muted dark ink. The robe is made of plain, coarse cloth, slightly loose-fitting, with wide sleeves. There are no elaborate patterns, only subtle ink wash textures suggesting the fabric's folds and flow.

A faint, ethereal glow, like gentle moonlight, subtly emanates from around his figure, representing his "Resonant Tone" ability. His overall posture is upright yet relaxed, hands resting naturally at his sides or slightly folded before him, embodying humility and a connection to nature. The image conveys a sense of quiet determination, inner purity, and a deep, subtle harmony with the surrounding aesthetic world., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: ink_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
